support.title: Support
support.hi_write_your_theme: Hey! My name is Miroslav. Online every day from 11:00 to 22:00 Moscow time. Write your question, problem or wish.
support.message_sent_offline: Your message has been sent. My local time
support.dont_close_window: and usually I'm offline, but maybe I'll answer within a minute. Don't close the window!
support.message_sent_online: Your message has been sent. I will try to answer within a minute. Don't close the window!
support.write_to_email: Didn't have time for a minute :( If the answer to the question is important to you, please write your Email here, I will definitely contact you. Or write to telegram @audiototext_admin or to email shubin@audiototext.ru
